Name: Diesel generator - Capacity: 100 to <350 kVA - Vibration isolated equipment that is not snubbed or restrained - Equipment fragility only

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing is per unit and is based upon 250 kVa.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Damaged, inoperative but anchorage is OK. Pipes and nozzles damaged.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair fracture pipes and damaged nozzles.

DamageStates.Description: Damaged, inoperative but anchorage is OK. Drive shaft misalignment.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Overhaul because of drive shaft misalignment.

DamageStates.Description: Damaged, inoperative but anchorage is OK. Minor electrical damage, e.g., failed relay.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Minor electrical repair e.g., replace relay.

DamageStates.Description: Damaged, inoperative but anchorage is OK. Exhaust line disconnected at expansion bellows.
